author: andy
msg: JENA-87 Exclude .svn directories in case checked out via svn command line.

author: xuhaihong
msg: GERONIMO-6106 Clean up temp files created in the deployment process
a. Start the reaper thread on the server start up, it will clean up the temp files generated by FileUtils in the last run
b. Keep a temp file list in the DeploymentContext, and will be deleted after the deployment finished

o Injected the Criteria in the EventService when adding a listener in ServerConext/ServerDirContext : the criteria was created but never used
